file_intent: ETL pipeline for CSV transaction data to aggregated reports

responsibility_blocks.description: Read transactions from CSV, convert rows to Transaction objects
responsibility_blocks.label: CSV ingestion and parsing

responsibility_blocks.description: Apply amount, currency, status, and category filters to transactions
responsibility_blocks.label: Transaction filtering

responsibility_blocks.description: Compute totals and per-key aggregates (category, currency, status)
responsibility_blocks.label: Aggregation of transactions

responsibility_blocks.description: Serialize aggregated report to JSON and human-readable summary
responsibility_blocks.label: Report writing

responsibility_blocks.description: Coordinate reader, filter, aggregator, and writer to produce reports
responsibility_blocks.label: Pipeline orchestration
